pages.text: On 5% of exposure, you'll receive 2 ritual slots, that can be filled by learning a $(l)ritual/$. After each 20% of exposure acquired, you'll receive new slots. Some powers also change your maximum slots, allowing you to learn more rituals.

pages.title: Requisites
pages.text: The only requisite to learn a ritual is the presence required by the ritual's circle, which is the ritual's level of power. Powerful rituals require more points in presence than weaker rituals. This can be seen in the description of the cursed item.

$(l)Cursed items/$ are objects possessed by the entity of a specific ritual. They allow you to learn a ritual, if you're fit to learn it. With one of these items in hand, right click an altar of transcendance. If you meet it's requirements, you'll learn the ritual. Your rituals can be seen in the same screen as your attributes.

pages.title: Power rituals
pages.text: Some rituals can only be learned by having a specific paranormal power. To learn these rituals, you just need to meet the power's requirements. You will automatically learn the ritual once you receive the power.
